java.lang.Object

Direct Known Subclasses:
Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object

Represents abstract piece.

Author:
Nikita Frolov

getLegalMoves

public abstract java.util.Collection<Move> getLegalMoves(MoveDirector director,
                                                         GameContext context)
Returns all legal moves for the piece.

Parameters:
director - director which is responsible for moves calculation
context - context representing game's current state
Returns:
collection of legal moves

getCandidateMoves

public abstract java.util.Collection<Move> getCandidateMoves(MoveDirector director,
                                                             GameContext context)
Returns all candidate moves for piece. Such moves are not analyzed and must not be performed.

Parameters:
director - director which is responsible for moves calculation
context - context representing game's current state
Returns:
collection of candidate moves

paint

public abstract void paint(PiecePainter painter)
Delegates piece painting to specified painter object.

Parameters:
painter - painter object responsible for painting
